description: Update the configuration for an adapter. FeatureTypes configurations cannot be updated. At least one new parameter must be specified as an argument.

parameters.name: AdapterId
parameters.description: A string containing a unique ID for the adapter that will be updated.

nested_items.name: AdapterId
nested_items.description: A string containing a unique ID for the adapter that has been updated.

nested_items.name: AdapterName
nested_items.description: A string containing the name of the adapter that has been updated.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: An object specifying the creation time of the the adapter that has been updated.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A string containing the description of the adapter that has been updated.

nested_items.name: FeatureTypes
nested_items.description: List of the targeted feature types for the updated adapter.

nested_items.name: AutoUpdate
nested_items.description: The auto-update status of the adapter that has been updated.
